class_notes: THIS COURSE DOES NOT COUNT FOR THE BIOLOGY MAJOR. Directed study with a Biology faculty member. Permission of instructor is required. Once permission of instructor is obtained, contact Tonya Woolcock at tdavis6@emory.edu to request a permission number.
course_description: Credit, one to four hours per semester. Prerequisite: permission of instructor.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142WE or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
